chapters.title: Chapter 28:  Night in Hinderstap
chapters.info: Blaeric Negina, p. 429—One of Joline's Warders. He has blue eyes, a pointed chin, and straight black hair. He is tall, and from Shienar. He now travels with Mat's entourage and Valan Luca's menagerie. See also Maza, Joline; Mizar, Fen.
